caption: Since its hit 20 degrees here in London (a big celebration as this is as good as English weather gets) me and shuttersong have teamed together to give away to a $50 gift card to one of you guys! All you have to do is like and comment on the photos that we publish on Species Magazine during this week! This week will be all things London, my favourite spots of the city! C'mon and  Get involved! This photo was taken as the sun rose over Freemasons hall in Covent Garden.
